snippet.title: UnMetal Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy now on: 
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1203710/UnMetal/ 
Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/unmetal-switch/
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP0134-CUSA27670_00-9903242160180130/
Xbox: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/unmetal/9p9kr2gn0bz3

In 1972 a crack commando squad threw you in prison for a crime you didn't commit. You promptly escaped from a maxumum-security stockade to the underground trying to survive from these soldiers of fortune.

UnMetal is a 2D stealth/action game (with a bit of humor) where the goal is to escape from an enemy military base. But what started as a simple break out ended up being an inside operation to prevent a massive attack against the NATO.

NEVER MISS OUT ON NEWS!
SUBSCRIBE: https://bit.ly/2IPMij9​ 
FOLLOW: https://twitter.com/vs_evil​
LIKE: https://www.facebook.com/versusevil​
VERSUS EVIL ON DISCORD: https://discord.gg/versusevil
